column2: Manage day to day operations of the Human Resources function in the organization, broadly three sub-verticals: HR Operations, Talent Acquisition, and HR Business Partnering. Bring in continuous process improvements, process automation, and digitization of HR Processes and ensuring full utilization of HRMS tools.      Deliver a quality and professional service to all internal customers and stakeholders, and coordinate with leaders of different businesses on all HR matters.      Good interpersonal skills as the resource will be interacting with the key stakeholders , and the founders.      Sound Human Resources domain knowledge required in terms of process deliverables.      Work with the senior leadership team for digitization of HR Processes.          Scope of work:-          Employee Onboarding and Offboarding      Employee Relations      HR Operations      Performance Management      Compensation and Benefits      HR Policies and Procedures      Employee Engagement      Legal Compliance          Preferred candidate profile:-          Minimum qualification - MBA in Human Resource with minimum 1-2+ years of experience      Minimum 1+ years of Team Handling experience is must      Excellent business English proficiency - both oral and written      Have good understanding & advanced skills on MS Office Applications, HRMS tools, Data Analytics      Demonstrated automations & process improvements experience      Coach team on day to day activities and ensure deliverables are met in timely manner      High level of integrity, professionalism, and organized nature      Worked in a highly evolving work environment

column2: Drives the execution of multiple business plans and projects by identifying customer and operational needs; developing and communicating business plans and priorities; removing barriers and obstacles that impact performance; providing resources; identifying performance standards; measuring progress and adjusting performance accordingly; developing contingency plans; and demonstrating adaptability and supporting continuous learning     Provides supervision and development opportunities for associates by selecting and training; mentoring; assigning duties; building a team-based work environment; establishing performance expectations and conducting regular performance evaluations; providing recognition and rewards; coaching for success and improvement; and ensuring diversity awareness     Promotes and supports company policies, procedures, mission, values, and standards of ethics and integrity by training and providing direction to others in their use and application; ensuring compliance with them; and utilizing and supporting the Open Door Policy     Ensures business needs are being met by evaluating the ongoing effectiveness of current plans, programs, and initiatives; consulting with business partners, managers, co-workers, or other key stakeholders; soliciting, evaluating, and applying suggestions for improving efficiency and cost-effectiveness; and participating in and supporting community outreach events                                                                                                 What youll do...                                                                                         Job summary:                 Senior Manager    People Partner Excellence will serve as a    critical partner   , responsible for leading a team of managers, being a trusted advisor for our People Partners, executing, and enhancing cyclical and routine work, driving continuous improvement and innovation, enabling data-driven decision making, and fostering collaboration and influence       This role plays a crucial part in supporting the business by enabling our People Partners across Global Tech and Corporate functio               What youll do:             Collaborate with People Partners:    You will work closely with the People Partner leadership team, who are key stakeholders. Your role will involve understanding the needs of our People Partners beyond what may be stated or obvious, identifying the correct processes, timelines, and resources.       Executing and enhancing cyclical and routine work:    Prioritize and balance multiple high-level projects and improvements by ensuring that you and your team execute cyclical and routine work across Global Tech and Corporate functions people processes. Gather feedback and provide support to ensure smooth and efficient execution for the business. Drive end-to-end ownership for cyclical and routine processes across cross-functional teams, including anticipating and developing roadmaps, timelines, action steps, and communication to relevant stakeholders. While also ensuring we are leveraging digital tools to evolve our processes and advocate for solutions that optimize execution.           Continuous Improvement and Innovation    - As the leader of the team, you will be expected to streamline and optimize by reimagining existing processes, centralizing, simplifying, and standardizing critical People work activities. The goal is to improve the overall experience by proposing innovative solutions. Anticipate emerging trends/topics and identify appropriate steps to adapt, keeping automation in mind.         D       ata-driven Decision Making:    You and your team will enable data-driven decisions by finding creative ways to approach, analyze, and apply data. You will work closely with stakeholders to understand their needs and provide them with the necessary insights to make informed decisions.           Collaboration and Influence:    Strong communication, collaboration and influence skills are essential in this role. Collaborate and provide leadership cross-functionally and with stakeholders to share knowledge, optimize processes, and leverage resources across teams. Consult with People Partners and COE teams to develop and communicate a holistic approach to executing and evolving cyclical processes that maximize value through every phase of the HR lifecycle.             What youll bring:           Driving clarity in ambiguous situations and propelling forward progress.     Demonstrated ability in manage and execute programs from end-to-end with excellence.     HR experience in a Corporate and highly matrixed environment.     Ability to build effective relationships with senior leaders and their direct reports to evolve the business.     Ability to influence leaders and business partners to accomplish results.     Sound judgment and experience in performance management, talent programs, and building diverse and inclusive teams.     Critical thinking skills and solution oriented.     Thrive in a fast-paced environment and be able to quickly adjust to changing circumstance

column2: Biological E Limited is looking for Sr. Executive /Assistant Manager to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     Senior Executive:A Senior Executive typically holds a mid-level position with more experience or expertise in a particular area compared to an Executive or Junior Executive     Responsibilities might include:Leadership: Taking on a more significant role in guiding and supervising junior staff or teams within a department     Specialized Tasks: Handling more complex assignments or tasks that require additional experience or expertise     Project Coordination: Overseeing and coordinating projects within their area of expertise, ensuring tasks are completed efficiently     Assistant Manager:An Assistant Manager is typically a mid-level managerial position responsible for supporting the manager in various aspects of departmental or team management     Responsibilities might include:Team Supervision: Assisting in supervising and guiding team members, delegating tasks, and ensuring smooth operations within the department     Operations Support: Providing support in day-to-day operational tasks, administrative duties, and ensuring efficient task execution     Decision Support: Assisting the manager in decision-making processes, especially regarding departmental policies, resource allocation, and key projects     Differences:Responsibilities: Assistant Managers often have more managerial responsibilities and involvement in decision-making compared to Senior Executives     Assistant Managers may have a more significant role in overseeing teams or projects     Hierarchy: In some organizations, Assistant Managers might have a slightly higher rank in the organizational hierarchy compared to Senior Executives, indicating a higher level of responsibility

column2: Artech India is looking for Associate - Staffing to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As an Associate in Staffing, you will play a pivotal role in supporting the recruitment and staffing efforts of our organization      Your primary responsibility will be to assist the staffing team in sourcing, screening, and selecting candidates for various positions within the company      You will work closely with hiring managers and other stakeholders to understand staffing needs, identify qualified candidates, and facilitate the hiring process      This role requires strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to effectively communicate with candidates and internal teams        Key Responsibilities:        Candidate Sourcing and Screening:Utilize various sourcing channels, including job boards, social media, professional networks, and referrals, to identify potential candidates      Screen resumes and applications to assess candidates' qualifications, skills, and experience      Conduct initial phone screenings to evaluate candidates' interest, availability, and fit for open positions      Coordination and Logistics:Schedule interviews, assessments, and other hiring-related activities for candidates and hiring managers      Coordinate travel arrangements and accommodations for candidates, if necessary      Manage communication with candidates throughout the recruitment process, providing updates and guidance as needed      Data Management and Reporting:Maintain accurate and up-to-date candidate records in the applicant tracking system (ATS) or recruitment database      Generate reports and metrics on recruitment activity, candidate pipelines, and hiring trends      Analyze data to identify areas for improvement and optimization in the recruitment process      Onboarding Support:Assist with the onboarding process for new hires, including collecting required documentation and facilitating orientation sessions      Coordinate with HR and hiring managers to ensure a smooth transition for new employees      Compliance and Documentation:Ensure compliance with all relevant laws, regulations, and company policies throughout the recruitment process      Maintain confidentiality of sensitive information and adhere to data protection guidelines      Prepare and distribute employment-related documentation, such as offer letters and contracts, in accordance with company procedures

column2: Job Description The Client Services Manager (CSM) is accountable for leading a team of recruiters to provide exceptional service to clients across one or more client accounts. This involves establishing trust and fostering robust relationships with key client contacts to accomplish the talent acquisition partnership objectives. Duties and Responsibilities: Team Management Lead a high performing team to provide high quality services focused on exceeding the expectations of clients. Set clear performance standards and goals for the team. Assess progress against goals and performance standards, proactively address gaps. Provide leadership and coaching to direct reports. Establish regular communications with direct reports through 1-1 meetings, team meetings with established agendas or other regular touch points. Provide in the moment feedback. Complete performance management processes, including providing feedback and proactively addressing gaps. Provide leadership to the team by earning trust, motivating and inspiring great performance while fostering a positive inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and learning. Client Management Showcase an extremely high level of understanding and becomes fully engrained in the client organization including building strong relationships with key stakeholders, organizational structure. Partner with internal Cielo teams and client leaders to ensure successful implementation of new clients. Develop recruiting metrics and analytics that provide insights and drive decision, including time to fill, aging, cost per hire, candidate and hiring leader satisfaction surveys, recruiter productivity, source of candidate and hire among others Directly works with Recruiters and hiring leaders to foster relationships and build trust Manage programs, events and campaigns to build candidate pipeline and drive recruiting strategy to meeting hiring goals Drive the team to develop comprehensive, strategic hiring strategies including passive candidate outreach, recruitment marketing plans and utilization of cutting-edge recruitment technologies Participate in client meetings, sharing updates and data. Discuss gaps in service delivery with proactive plans to address and remediate Support recruitment process needs of clients Cielo Operational Excellence Leverage shared delivery resources effectively Maximize the use of Cielo resources to meet goals Responsible for Cielo-specific metric reports and P&L management Drive standardization, continuous improvement and consistency of processes and procedures Effectively work as part of the Cielo Client Services Management team to share best practices and drive organizational initiatives Additional duties as assigned Qualifications Prior experience in a results-oriented TA role in talent acquisition or human resources Experience coaching peers or managing a team for  more than 5 years in a team environment. Exposure: Exposure and knowledge of various recruitment technologies, including Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) and social media tools. Strong proficiency in Reporting &, Dashboards. Education: Bachelors degree in business, management, human resources, or related field, preferred.

column2: Job Brief We are looking for a dynamic Associate  Training and Placement to join our team. In this role, you will collaborate with students, recruiters, and other teams to monitor student progress, provide feedback, assist with career development, and align students with suitable job roles and employment opportunities. Location  - Mumbai(Andheri)   Job Function: Student Progress Monitoring: Monitor and assess the academic and career progress of students. Provide regular feedback to students to enhance their employability. Career Development Assistance: Assist students in resume building, interview preparation, and job search strategies. Offer guidance to help students achieve their career aspirations. Alignment of Job Roles: Work with students to identify their strengths and interests. Match students with suitable job roles and employment opportunities. Collaboration: Efficiently collaborate with students, recruiters, and cross-functional teams to ensure the smooth execution of placement activities and events.? Organize collaborative events, workshops, masterclasses, super sessions, placement drives, and outreach initiatives to facilitate networking opportunities for students and engage industry leaders, potentially creating hiring prospects with streamlined coordination. Skills Required: Communication Skills: Strong verbal and written communication skills are essential for effective interaction with students and other stakeholders. Career Guidance: A passion for guiding and mentoring students in their career development. Interpersonal Skills: Excellent interpersonal skills to build rapport with students and collaborate with teams. Analytical Skills: Ability to assess student progress and align job roles with their skills and aspirations. Tech-Savvy: Proficiency in Google Workspace (Sheets, Docs, Slides, etc.) is required. Basic Digital Marketing Knowledge: A fundamental understanding of digital marketing concepts is essential. Qualification: Education: A bachelors degree in any field. Experience: Prior experience in career counseling, training, or placement services is a plus. Mumbai Residents Only

column2: Artech India  is looking for Manager - Staffing  to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey    We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented individual to join our team as a Manager of Staffing     The ideal candidate will have a strong background in human resources, recruitment, and staff management     In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing the recruitment and hiring process, managing staffing needs across various departments, and ensuring that our organization has the right talent in place to meet our business objectives       Responsibilities:       Recruitment and Hiring:Develop and implement recruitment strategies to attract top talent     Coordinate with department heads to identify staffing needs and create job descriptions     Source candidates through various channels, including job boards, social media, and networking     Screen resumes, conduct interviews, and make hiring decisions in collaboration with hiring managers     Ensure a positive candidate experience throughout the recruitment process     Staffing Management:Work closely with department managers to understand their staffing requirements and develop staffing plans accordingly     Monitor staffing levels and adjust recruitment efforts as needed to meet business needs     Track and analyze staffing metrics, such as time-to-fill and turnover rates, to identify areas for improvement     Implement retention strategies to reduce turnover and promote employee satisfaction     Provide guidance and support to managers on staffing-related issues     Compliance:Ensure compliance with all relevant employment laws and regulations     Stay up-to-date on changes in employment law and make recommendations for policy updates as necessary     Maintain accurate and up-to-date records related to staffing and recruitment activities     Team Leadership:Lead a team of staffing coordinators and recruiters, providing guidance, training, and support as needed     Foster a positive and collaborative team environment     Set performance goals and conduct regular performance evaluations for team members

column2: Job Title: Business Development Manager (FTE Clients Only) Location: Hyderabad or Remote Share profile to : manasa@precisiontechcorp.com LinkedIn :   https://www.linkedin.com/in/manasa-salla-0836711a8 Job Description:    We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Business Development      Manager to join our team and drive growth in the US IT/NON IT staffing      sector.  As a Business Development Manager, you will be responsible for      identifying new business opportunities, developing relationships with new      FTE clients,and expanding our market presence in the IT/Non IT staffing      industry.  This role requires a deep understanding of the US IT/NON IT      staffing market, excellent communication and negotiation skills, and a      proven track record of achieving sales targets. Key Responsibilities:     Develop and execute a strategic business development plan to      generate leads, acquire new FTE clients, and grow revenue in the US IT/Non      IT staffing sector. Experience in selling contingent search to place full time      employees Identify and prospect potential clients through various      channels, including cold calling, email campaigns, networking events, and      referrals. Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers at      client organizations, understanding their hiring needs, and positioning      our staffing solutions accordingly. Collaborate with the recruiting team to ensure a seamless delivery      process, meeting client expectations and maintaining high levels of      customer satisfaction. Stay updated on industry trends, market dynamics, and competitive      landscape to identify growth opportunities and make informed business      decisions. Qualifications: Minimum Bachelor's degree required from any IT/NON IT Sector. Minimum of 10 years of experience in business development or sales      roles on FTE Clients within the US IT staffing industry. Proven track record of achieving and exceeding sales targets and      driving revenue growth. Excellent communication, presentation,and negotiation skills, with      the ability to build rapport and influence key stakeholders. Self-motivated and results-oriented, with a demonstrated ability to      work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

column2: zenda is looking for People Experience Manager to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey           Employee Engagement    : They design and implement strategies to enhance employee engagement and satisfaction. This includes organizing team-building activities, recognition programs, and employee appreciation events to foster a positive workplace culture and sense of belonging.            Talent Development    : They oversee talent development initiatives, including training and development programs, career planning, and performance management processes. They support employees in setting and achieving personal and professional development goals.            Employee Wellness Programs    : They promote employee wellness and work-life balance by implementing wellness programs, health initiatives, and flexible work arrangements. They provide resources and support to help employees manage stress, maintain physical and mental well-being, and achieve work-life integration.            Onboarding and Offboarding    : They manage the onboarding process for new hires, ensuring a smooth transition into the organization and providing necessary orientation and training. They also oversee offboarding procedures, conducting exit interviews and gathering feedback to identify opportunities for improvement. column2: Company Overview: HireForge is a dynamic and innovative recruitment firm specializing in connecting top talent with leading organizations across various industries. We are committed to providing exceptional recruitment solutions and helping companies build their dream teams. Position Overview: We are seeking a skilled and results-driven Recruiter to join our team. As a Recruiter at HireForge, you will play a crucial role in identifying and attracting top talent for our clients, building strong relationships with hiring managers, and delivering exceptional candidate experiences. You will work closely with our internal teams to understand client requirements, source candidates, and manage the recruitment process from start to finish. Responsibilities: Collaborate with hiring managers to understand client requirements, job specifications, and ideal candidate profiles. Develop and execute effective recruitment strategies to identify and attract top talent, including social media, job boards, and professional networks. Source, screen, and shortlist candidates, ensuring a high-quality pool of applicants for client consideration. Manage the recruitment process from start to finish, ensuring timely and efficient communication with clients and candidates. Conduct interviews, assessments, and reference checks to evaluate candidate fit and suitability. Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, understanding their hiring needs and providing ongoing support throughout the recruitment process. Negotiate offer terms and ensure a seamless onboarding experience for successful candidates. Meet and exceed monthly, quarterly, and annual recruitment targets, effectively managing candidate pipelines and forecasting accurately. Stay updated with industry trends, market dynamics, and competitor activities to identify new recruitment opportunities and maintain a competitive edge. Provide regular reports and updates on recruitment activities, candidate pipelines, and client satisfaction to the management team. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in human resources, business administration, or a related field. Proven track record of at least 1 year in recruitment or a related field, preferably in the recruitment industry. Strong understanding of the recruitment industry, including hiring processes, talent acquisition strategies, and market trends. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport with clients and candidates. Self-motivated and target-driven, with a proven ability to meet and exceed recruitment targets. Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a strong sense of accountability and ownership. Proficiency in using recruitment software, applicant tracking systems, and other recruitment tools to manage candidate pipelines and recruitment activities. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think strategically and adapt to changing market dynamics. Willingness to travel, as required, to meet with clients and attend industry events. Join HireForge and be part of a dynamic team that is revolutionizing the recruitment industry. Apply today and help us connect talent with opportunity!  NOTE:- Apply only if you are comfortable for Salary Budget offered.

column2: Hello,   We have opening for below requirement matching your profile. Kindly review the job description and let me know if you are available in the job market. Summary Position: Bench Sales Recruiter Salary:                              Depends on Experience Location:                         Work from Home (Remote) Industry:                          IT-Software / Software Services / IT Staffing Job Description: As a Bench Sales Recruiter at Edgesys Consulting, you will play a pivotal role in our talent acquisition  and client engagement efforts.  Your primary responsibilities will include:   Client Acquisition: Proactively seek out potential clients and submit Edgesys Bench candidates  through various channels, including job portals, your personal network, and references.   Candidate Marketing: Showcase Edgesys candidates effectively to mid-level clients, securing  contract positions on a corp-to-corp basis.   Independent Database Building: Build and maintain a comprehensive database of mid-level  clients, ensuring a robust network for future opportunities.   Bench Candidate Marketing: Develop and implement a well-defined strategy for marketing  bench candidates, leveraging your existing database of clients and sub-clients.   Industry Expertise: Possess an excellent understanding of the complete life cycle of Bench  Sales and Bench Marketing, guiding your team and resources effectively.   Team Training: If required, lead and mentor a team to optimize bench consultant marketing,  minimizing bench time.   Resource Positioning: Collaborate with bench resources to ensure optimal positioning for  upcoming requirements, ensuring a high selection rate.   Technical Knowledge: Demonstrate hands-on experience in end-to-end bench sales  processes across a range of IT technologies, including but not limited to Project Management,  Business Analysis, Quality Assurance, Java, .NET, SharePoint, PHP, Business Intelligence,  MicroStrategy, C/C++, Informatica, Mainframes, AS/400, FileNet, Salesforce, Pega,  Network/Windows Administration, Oracle Apps/DBA, MS SQL Development/DBA, PeopleSoft,  SAP, and more.   Client Compatibility: Pre-screen clients and evaluate candidate compatibility with specific job  requirements, ensuring an ideal match before submission.   Digital Proficiency: Navigate and engage effectively with various job portals, including  LinkedIn, Dice, Monster, and Indeed.   Resource Management: Efficiently manage a high volume of resource requests in a  competitive environment, adapting your search focus as needed.   Communication Skills: Exhibit excellent oral, written, and interpersonal communication skills.   Networking: Proactively connect and network on LinkedIn, tech groups, and other platforms  to gather market intelligence and generate leads.   Geographic Awareness: Possess a good understanding of US geography.   Full-time Commitment: If selected by Edgesys, candidates should be fully committed during  regular work hours and should not be concurrently employed elsewhere.   Equipment: Maintain a personal computer with a reliable internet connection.    Summary:  Position: Bench Sales Recruiter  Experience: 4+ years Work Hours: 8:30 am  5:00 pm EST  Location: Remote work from home  Functional Area: HR, Bench Sales, Bench Marketing  Role Category: Bench Sales and Marketing for the US Market  We believe this role offers a great opportunity for professional growth and development We look forward to discussing your potential contribution to our team.  If interested kindly share your resume on kajal@edgesys.com or WhatsApp on 9769261776 Thank you,? With Regards,   Kajal Gaud Edgesys Consulting  411 Route 17 South, Suite # 310  Hasbrouck Heights, NJ 07604  T: 201-754-4555
